comments:
steps to reproduce:

   - use the attached report
   - run genReport in runtime package or,
   - run ReportRunner directly from workbench

expected behavior:

   - the attached report can be created

actual behavior:

   - exceptions thrown out

org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: Some required parameter values are not set or set to incompatible data type.
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:158)

from command line:

genReport --mode runrender --format html --output Test.html --htmltype html locale "en" -p "sample=hello" --encoding "utf-8" test.rptdesign
The user should use htmlType instead htmltype.

traces.message: Some required parameter values are not set or set to incompatible data type.
